name: Whiskey-Marinated Steak
author: Victoria Champagne Benoit
summary: I love the steak at a restaurant I frequent. I developed a recipe at home through trial and error. I feel it comes pretty close. This is a flavorful way to grill steak. Hope you enjoy!
directions: Whisk together the water, whiskey, pineapple juice, brown sugar, diced onion, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, liquid smoke, and minced garlic in a bowl
Lie the steaks in the bottom of a baking dish
Pour the marinade over the steaks; refrigerate overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil grate
Grill steaks to desired doneness, 3 to 5 minutes per side for medium-rare
Allow steaks to rest for 5 to 10 minutes before serving
